content.detailedDescription:
Sharp turns ... high speeds .. possibliy 1500 mph, maybe within 30  miles away from our perspective....6 possible witnesses...4 defenitely...
no explanation on record.

friday, memorial day weekend of 1997...From 10:50 p.M. till 1:20a.M sat morning over dallas, tx....
for 2.5 hours we watched them play...
then again on the following sunday for about 1 1/2 hours.

no other reports...Were made . nor heard of.

wish to find other witnesses..

thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 star -like objects ,...Two were "playing"

content.detailedDescription:
Four ufos and two alien pilots observed in near infrared via
a near infrared converted webcam
enhances to pictures to extract details submitted in 
attached video.
content.summary: Four ufos in formation observed in near infrared

content.detailedDescription: Richard webb (mufon) and myself were at the firepit on the ranch where i work, about 60-70 miles south of stephenville, tx, watching for ufos. at 2050, we saw a very large orange light/object move through the sky from the west to east (roughly). the large orange light/object would flash on then off, each for an approximate duration of one second. this continued for about 20 seconds until the the light/object disappeared.
content.summary: Orange light moving/flashing on and off

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west down 159th st. before oak park ave when i saw what looked like the old tinley park lights hovering over the forest preserve.  i initially filed a report on the ufo reporting site.

i talked to my mother about it and told her i thought i had been seeing things.  it amazed me though.  if i wasn't driving, i would have probably gone into a trance staring at it.  but because i was driving, i don't know exactly how long it hovered over the forest preseve.

i don't know why i moved my eyes to the side, something caught me and i gasped and thought, "oh my gosh!  i am not looking at the tinley park lights".  pretty odd since it was just a week before halloween, one of the second biggest events for them here in tinley.

my mother told me about ufo hunters being on history channel and how they were going to be talking about the tinley park lights 3 days after i witnessed the latest event.  she recorded it on dvr and since i just finished watching it and saw the people involved were from mufon i decided to look it up on the internet and leave a report here too.

i will say, the object i saw appeared to be smaller than what they showed on ufo hunters.  but the lights are the same, the shape was the same.
content.summary: Three red lights over oak forest

content.detailedDescription: My wife came into our house at approx 7:10 pm cst and said there was an unusual, bright light in the sky. it was a clear, night time sky and she was driving home and noticed the light in the sky as she was going down our road, traveling north, and directly ahead and above (an undterminable distance away). i was inside the house, but immediately went outside when she mentioned the light in the sky. we live in a rural area, so it is naturally dark outside at this time. we walked down our driveway to the road, let our eyes adjust to the darkness and looked north and up in the direction she described. we both saw the light, just as she described it. we stood there for maybe 5-10 minutes and watched it flash multiple, visible colors: white, red, yellow and others we couldn't describe. it hoovered and dipped up and down in jerky movements. my wife said it appeared larger when she first saw it, and it now seemed smaller. we both decided it must be moving away from us, headed north. we eventually went back inside the house. an hour latter i went out for another view and the night sky, looking north, seemed perfectly normal. this was a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: A very large, bright light that appeared to change colors. moved/hovered in zig-zag motion. was not conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Driving when i seen red light in the sky, me and 2 other people in the car seen it turn from slow blinking red spher to no blinking for about 5 seconds the light became dim then it started blinking angain. i slowed down to watch itand it seemed to be just floating in the air about 500-600 feet up. the lights became very bright red then some times it would become almost white in color, seem to be 2 big red lights on the craft on the back part, craft seemed small, maybe as big as a car. this took place at 8:20 pm on oct.30 2008 craft stayed in the same area for about 5 minutes then i drove away but still could see it in the air.
content.summary: Seen extreamly slow moving redish white ball object

content.detailedDescription: It was fall in a very rural part of south-western north dakota.  the usaf had been flying low level and high level missions in that part of the state most of the year and we became quite used to seeing aircraft doing bombing runs and refueling tracks.  after i joined the af i found that our barn had been used as a visual sighting aid during those runs.  during the month of october my church decided to have a hay ride on our farm and i was the elected driver of the small case tractor that would pull the hay rack.  the ride lasted from just before dark to well after dark.  in the pasture during the return to the yard my brother who was also riding on the tractor with me tapped me on the shoulder (it was too noisy from the exhaust of the tractor to talk) and pointed to the sky.  when i looked up i saw a flight of several triangular shaped objects each with 3 round white lights on the bottom with one light at each apex of the triangle. i believe there were 6 black triangles flying in formation of one in front then two behind then three behind that.  on seeing them i turned off the tractor and started talking with my brother.  we were wondering what they were.  i asked the people riding on the hay rack about them but none of them could see the objects.  it was a very bright moonlit night with very light cloud cover.  so light and the clouds so thin you could see the stars and moon thru the clouds and they left a shadow on the clouds.  the triangles were above the clouds but it appeared they were very close to us.  they made no sound and were moving in a direction of wnw to ese relative to us at about a speed of 10 to 15 knots.  my brother and i watched for a few minutes then as they were moving away i started the tractor. we never spoke of it again until almost 30 years later.  my initial feelings were wonder at what they were that quickly turned to boredom.  i got tired of watching them and then went about my business.  my brother remembers this happening but is very reluctant to talk about it.  the odd thing is i will watch a known airplane for several minutes and i had better things to do that night and then never mentioned it to the person that was with me for that long.  thinking back on it now i don't remember anything after starting the tractor to drive away.  that is the last of my memory of the evening.  i remember events leading up to that very well.
content.summary: Flight of ufo's drifed overhead complete quiet

content.detailedDescription:
Put both ufos through superresoluton, wavelet extraction in iris astronomy software package, followed by gimp software neon edge detection.

first ufo had woman shape on it, so put processed picture back into iris for more wavelet extraction

video edited for length, second clip inserted with slowed down video, extraction of pictures of both ufos put into this submitted video.
content.summary: Alien on board one ufo, second ufo interesting shape

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work today. i was on rt 30 heading eastbound, and the object appeared to my left, right before the exit to rt 222. i saw this vertical light rod that seemed like it was glowing from inside-it was very bright.It was stationary at first and then began to move to the left,faded in brightness,came back within what seemed like half a second with 3 rods next to each other- and then completely disappeared.I kept looking at the skies to see if it would appear again-and it did!The last time i saw it, i was on rt 276 eastbound-right before the downingtown exit.The object which was in the beginning vertical, turned horizontal and then it looked like a saucer with a lid on top-and the top part of the saucer was not bright but looked metallic.It was very thin, and the bottom part of the object still was glowing.It then disappeared.Both incidents were less than 30 seconds long.
content.summary: Saw rod shaped lights twice

content.detailedDescription:
i'm a member of mufon and, as a hobby/interest have been into the ufo phenomena for about 30 years. i did post-grad work at the university of chicago in social service administration where i earned an m.A. in 1972. today, i'm  a board certified clinical social worker, where both my wife and i run a specialized therapy program in los angeles for children diagnosed with autism spectrum disorders.  our clinic  provides applied behavior analysis therapy to autistic children.   i'm only telling you about this, so that you will be aware that i am not some "nut job" writing to you about ufo's. 

now, the reason for this email:  on september 14, 2008, my wife and i were sitting in our living room and had turned the tv on to watch 'monster quest' on the history channel.  the show was titled, "china's wildman," and was reportedly supposed to have been a video of someone living in the remote area of china.  the show however, was not on that subject.  rather, we found ourselves watching a documentary of a sort on the 9/11 attack on the world trade center.  we later found out that the show was called "101 days that changed america."  the video was excellent and reportedly was filmed by amateurs who had their video cameras at the time and were able to film the attack on the world trade center.  it contained some of the most amazing footage i have ever seen of this tragic event.  

while watching the video, i noticed that besides the filming of the attack on the world trade center, there were also a significant number of ufo's  spotted  simultaneously as when the attack occurred.  i mentioned this to my wife, who is  basically "indifferent" to ufo's and psi phenomena.  my wife susan, who is from england, has little or no interest in these topics. i only mention this to point out that, when i told susan that there were ufo's in the video, she thought i was nuts.  however, when playing the video back and freeze framing parts of the video, susan, with all of her indifference and skepticism, admitted, "yes, there are ufo's on this video."  we both became quite excited about it.  i then got out my sony cyber shot, 7.2 mega pixel camera and filmed some video clips right off of the tv.  you can hear both of us screaming throughout the film clips  i am a rank amateur in filming anything, so i was really glad that the video actually came out ok.   i sent clips of the video to youtube.  actually, i uploaded three video's to youtube.  i had a lot of response on one video (several thousand hits) and much less response on the other two.  interestingly, most of the responses i got were people who thought that they were looking at either birds or fighter planes or.....That "i was nuts."  i was surprised, not so much with their observations, but with the lack of response of anyone who also "saw the ufo's."  i could not understand it, other than to think that one of the reasons for this might have to do with people's "belief" systems i.E. they refuse to acknowledge something as 'strange' as a ufo because it goes against their own belief system i.E.'they cannot exist, therefore they don't exist, therefore, what i am seeing must be something conventional such as birds or jets etc."  after getting only a few responses from viewers regarding seeing the ufo's,  i decided to 'freeze frame" some of the shots of the ufo's and then send them to coast-to-coast and put them on "flickr" with a link to the youtube videos and vice versa.  i then began to get some responses from others who did see the ufo's.  

i have attached a zip folder that contains many of the freeze frame shots that were uploaded to flickr. i also sent the same photos to coast-to-coast and to jim maars and ryan s. wood and  but have not heard back from anyone as of yet. i also emailed the history channel and asked them if they were aware of the ufo's on that particular video which they aired.  if so, i wondered why no one said anything about it.  i told the history channel that they have a responsibility to the public, to at least mention this and/or, let the public know if anything on the film was "doctored."  the history channel and coast to coast never wrote back.  i still have the original broadcast on my dvr.  as soon as i figure out how to record it on a dvd or a video tape i will then have a copy for posterity!  

i would like mufon to look at the freeze frame shots i attached to this email.  tell me what your opinion is of these. i thought, that since the ufo's were spotted and filmed during the 9/11 attack, that this was very significant, not just to those of us in the usa, but really, to everyone in the world.  the video was seen by millions, and is available to the public. considering that the 9/11 attack on the united states was one of the most significant horrible events of all time, and considering that ufo's in mass, were reportedly present "at the site of the 9/11 attack, i would think that this event (i.E. 9/11 + the ufo's) would be seen as something very significant for all of humankind. 

 as i said, i have the original video on dvr on my tv set.  if the ufo's were in fact present during the 9/11 attack, as i believe they were, than why is there not more discussion of this? with all of the reported cases of ufo' in the literature, including that of mufon, i would expect that this event would be something that deserves a thorough investigation.  what better investigators could there be, than mufon!  with all of the reports of ufo's + worldwide interest in the phenomena + the sighting and filming of ufo's at the exact time of the world trade center attack, i would say that there is no better time than the present for doing a full scale investigation.  if it's a fraud, then the millions of people who saw the video should be aware of that. if, on the contrary, the photo's are real and no hoax was perpetrated, than by all means, this information should be on every tv news show in the nation and the world!    i just cannot understand why the ufo phenomena at the world trade center on 9/11 is not talked about.  i can't even get a response from the history channel regarding the video they showed nationally.  could this be another conspiracy in the making?  i'm just asking.  for something this significant to the entire world, i would think that there would be tremendous  interest in it.  one ufo on the film is so clear that you can make out the demarcations on the craft and, can actually see the color i.E. bronze.  that particular shot was taken of the ufo right in front of the world trade center after the initial attack.  these craft were moving so rapidly, that i really doubt that anyone would have the sophistication and the equipment to "fake it."  why would they do that in the first place. there is absolutely no mention of this event in the media i.E. the ufo's that were present.  

if you think that this event is as important  as i do, perhaps mufon can  bring it to the attention of the public. i look forward to your reply.
thank you for taking the time to check this out!  i hope it's useful.
content.summary: Ufo's in mass showed up at time of attack on the wtc on 9/11/2001

content.detailedDescription:
My house is located about 4 miles ese of stephenville, tx.  it was nearly dark so i could not see if the objects were solid or lights only.

at about 7:17 to the wsw about 15 degrees off the horizon there was an orange to red "star".  knowing there was no bright star (or planet) in that location, i first thought it was the iss but it wasn't moving.  it was about the same brightness as the visible planet (perhaps venus).  it was red to orange ...I best describe the look as if the colors were liquid.

then, it blinked off ...Then back on in the same location.  about 5 (or so) seconds later, it reappeared in the s at about 15 degrees off the horizon.  blinked off then back on then disappeared.

when the light first blinked on, coyotes started barking loudly (i know that sounds strange) ...When it went off, they quit.  

i stood there probably another 3 or 4 minutes scanning the western sky and saw a faint con trail in the remaining sunlight at a very high altitude probably 45 degrees off the wsw horizon and that puppy was moving!  made a "comma" shape then disappeared ...The con trail disappeared quicker than one from a plane.  a minute or two later, another con trail made the same "comma" shape only going downward.  it disappeared quickly as well.

then, i saw three bright lights (lined up) and appeared to be from one "craft" blink on then off ...Repeated two times.  a couple seconds later, another three (like the first three only more orange) blinked on then off more towards the south.  if it was from the same vehicle, that thing was going fast to get from point "a" to point "b" in that length of time.

when the lights started flashing, there were no jets (other than the odd one or two headed to dfw) but maybe 10 to 15 minutes later, there seemed to be multiple jets (it was too dark to see what kind they were) but i assume military.  two flew directly over head coming from ssw heading nne both flying low and very fast.

i had my camera but couldn't get it focused fast enough to get an image.
content.summary: Two sessions of lights appearing and disappearing and unusual con trail

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a break from work and went for a short bike ride on a common path. i sat on a bench for a few minutes and looked up towards the moon which was just sw of dead center overhead. to the south of the moon i noticed what appeared to be a star. this star was very high which is a main reason that it appeared to me to be a star. this light began moving slowly towards the south where eventually i lost it as it got closer to the sun. i chaled it up to being something pretty cool to see but probably just a mylar balloon or something of the sort. i was unsure of how high they could get prior to bursting. there were other planes w/contrails in the sky and they seemed unaffected by whatever was up there. i phoned my parents who live in michigan and told my mother what i saw only to be told by my father (usaf ret.) that he had seen something strikingly similar back in michigan only a week prior.

the next day i took my break around 40 minutes later. i sat in the same place and looked up. at first there was nothing, then i saw it again. this told me for sure that this was not some random balloon and this time it moved to the east, and i followed it for 15 minutes. since i was only three miles from my house i tried to ride the rest of the wy home to break out my telescop and attempt to make out possible detail. i stopped every few hundred yards to ensure that i did not lose sight of it in the high sky. by the time i got home it was gone. 

sadly, i cannot put any great detail into this as it simply appeared as any star you would see at nighttime. i know it was not a plane and was not a helicopter. i spend a lot of time simply looking up, and have done so since i was a child. this was simply somehting i had no explanation for.
content.summary: Daytime sighting - star moving wavelike very high in the sky - consecutive days

content.detailedDescription: I was heading west on hwy 44 towards eustis at approximately 11:22 am. it was a bright, blue-sky, sunny, crisp day (today 10/30/08). i was listening to the radio, singing along out loud to the song on the radio with the windows open.  an elderly man in a very old, white chevy pickup with a trailer hitch/trailer and equipment was traveling in front of me... as we rounded a bend with a large bank of trees and foresting & fielding on either side, there was an object (cigar shape), very lengthy and very, bright silver hovering over the road just below the tree horizon line.  we both swerved off the road and i no sooner said "holy s---!" and it disappeared to the southwest in a flash... couldn't have last more than a minute.  if i had to judge its size from arm length, it was larger than a baseball (oblong) to cover it's body as it sat in the distance... but it was oh so visible!  fantastic!  i've never seen anything move so fast and out of sight!  and there was absolutely no noise whatsoever!  i was excited beyond belief.  the elderly man of course didn't know what to make of it and had a good laugh, but i was jumping out of my skin with enthusiasm.
content.summary: Turned corner of tree banks on hwy 44... object was below tree horizon hovering in air, then disappeared in seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on roscoe blvd and van nuys blvd and i so it abuve  me in the sky wan lookt at the star shipe it head in to the clods it was hading in the clods from me. this is my first ufo space shipe siting.
content.summary: I so a silver circle ufo in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On october 23rd while returning from hico texas stephenville texas on highway 6 i observed three bright orange objects traveling at an high rate of speed to the west. they were only visible for three or four minutes then went out of sight.  they did travel one right behind the other but were not consistant with any conventional aircraft that i am aware of or have seen in this area.
content.summary: On october 21st i observed three orange lights traveling west above erath county.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brother's house in stephenville tx, and was about to leave to make my way back to my home in the dfw area.  when we were walking outside to say our goodbyes we could hear sirens within the city, and then we heard several dogs starting to bark at the same time.  i made the comment about how people should listen to their dogs, because pets have a sick sense of knowing something is wrong before humans do.  my sister in law made comments about the night before when some of her friends saw ufos in the sky just the day before.  then at 19:20 we saw what i would call ufo the first sighting was two oval/circular looking objects less than two miles to the south by south west of where my brother lives.  they appeared for about a second then reappeared to the south about quarter of a mile again within two seconds or so.  the sky wasn't dark yet so if something turned off its lights we would have seen a solid form of sort, but we never did.  after talking for a few minutes about what we just saw, we decided to head to the southwest.  when we were about to turn onto the highway heading towards dublin, tx, we saw four lights (lined up in a row) they were lower to the ground (in my opinion) than the other ufos we saw.  the four lights appeared for maybe two seconds then disappeared and we never saw anything again for the rest of the night.  shortly after we heard and saw two military jets coming from the north east heading in a southwest direction.  i am prior military for almost 10 years so i am familiar with the sound of our military jets, especially when they travel at a high rate of speed.  please feel free to contact about these events.  i am not saying i believe in ufos from outer space, but i do know what i saw last night.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in stephenville tx, 29 oct 2008

content.detailedDescription: My 11 year old son was playing with friends outside at dusk last night. i was not with him at the time, so i am not sure what time the sun set last night. when he got home, he told my husband that he saw a ufo. my husband told me when i arrived home from work. i called my son into my room and asked him to sit with me and explain what he saw. my son is a very quiet child and is a horrible liar. you can always tell by his expression when he is not being completely honest and he does not suffer from an over-active imagination. his description was so detailed and the way he described it, like he could see it as he recalled it, convinced me that his claim has merit. he said that he and his friend were walking home a friend, several streets away, to his house. (*note- he knew by telling me this that he was informing me that he did something that was not allowed)while walking back something caught his attention. he looked up and saw a circle or disk shaped object hoovering. when asked,how high up was it?, he replied "not as high as a airplane; more like a helicopter". when asked, how big was it?, he replied "big...Like 5 houses put together". when asked, did it have lights?, he replied "it did light up like the glow sticks we get sometimes, but it didn't shine like a flashlight." when asked, was it a solid or transparent?, he replied "solid, i couldn't see thru it." when asked, what color was is?, he replied "white, but shiny." when asked, was it silver?, he replied "no, white". when asked, where was it going?, he replied "it just stayed in one spot, then moved slowly away, then disappeared." when asked, what sound did it make?, he relied "it didn't make any sound, because when my friend and i were walking home and turned back on to our street, we heard 2 planes flying in the direction of when the ufo was headed before it disappeared." when asked, what kind of planes were they?, he replied "i don't know, the fast ones." when asked, where they military planes, like fighter jets?, he replied "yes". when asked, are you making this up?, he replied "no". when asked, did you talk about ufo's at school recently or with your friends?, he replied "no". we went over this several times and then sent him off to bed. he had a very hard time going to sleep. i am certin that his account is true.
content.summary: My 11 year son reported seeing a ufo on 10/29/08 near our home at dusk.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to walk the dogs into my backyard and as i was about to bring them back in a flash of light caught the corner of my eye. i looked up and saw what at first i thought was a chrome painted jet. then i realized it didn't have wings. it went into a light cloud and was slightly obscured so i kept my eyes trained till it emerged. it was flying northerly but drifting closer in my direction. as it got closer i saw that about 3/4 down the length of it, it segmented and then was gold colored with lines.( so chrome 3/4 down it's body) there was no vapor trail.It seemed to me that the body of it was a little bit smaller than a regular commercial jet liner. it keet drifting closer but still moving north and then the front of it sort of turned a degree. it seemed to lose a bit of altitude and then drifted the other way. there was no nooise coming from it that i could discern. while watching i was amazed and kept trying to explain to myself what i was seeing. i never thought in my life i would see something like that especially in broad daylight. as it moved over the trees to my left i noticed that even my dogs had stopped and were watching it. i finally lost sight of it behind the trees.
   i don't pay attention to ufo shows. i don't watch the night sky nor do i believe in aliens. i'm a business owner in college working on my bachlor's degree. i cannot explain what i saw. it had no wings, stayed at a steady speed and drifted unlike a jet which would have only flown straight.
content.summary: Chrome cigar shaped object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Two ufos seen on near infrared converted webcam.
pictures extracted from video of ufos, one ufo showed a froglike
creature driving an open cockpit ufo.
movie edited for length attached to this message
content.summary: Two, possible three ufo, alien in cockpit flying

content.detailedDescription: I had just let the pups out and was waiting on them to come back to go inside, i saw a beautiful whirw shooting star, but did not think any more about it. the pups seemed to be in a hurry because it was so cold. i looked up to see an aircraft flying over waiting to hear the sound of the receeding jet engines,but there was none. i heard the pups comming up the steps and started to look down at them when a beautiful white orb went flashing through the trees. there was absolutely no sound, anywhere. it was almost deffining. know what i mean. the dog at a neighbors house began to bark, the owner yelled at them and they hushed.  i kept looking for the orb to reamurge some where but it never did.  i let the pups inside and comtinued to wait. there were all kinds of jet strobe lights but no sound. and it still seemed extreamly cold. sudenly there was all kinds of yepps and barks from a family of coyte that live up the road about 1/4 mile and it seemed everything was back insink again. the sighting of the falling star and the orb took only 30 seconds but for every thing to go forward again took about 10 to 15 minutes. seemed like a long time.
content.summary: I had just finished an interview mnad taken my pups out for potty  breaksaw white shooting  star.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking across the bus park, on the way to check out my assigned bus for my morning commuter "county connector" run to everett, when something caused me to look up.  there, in the pre-dawn blackness, directly above me, i saw a large, dark object passing over, in a general south to north direction.  this object, while appearing to be at a relatively low alititude (hard to judge accurately in the dark), was completely silent; i heard no sound whatsoever at any time during this sighting.  this object was large, and had a generally circular shape, but with protrusions on the leading edge.  it appeared to be black, or, more like it was colorless and was somehow "reflecting" the color or the night.  on its underside there were two equally-sized circular openings which glowed in a phosphorescent green.  this was a glow and did not appear to be any sort of lighting, as we normally see it. my guess is that it was suggestive of some sort of energy source, or some other, unknown application.    these openings were large, each taking up about half of its side of the underside of the object.  other than that i could see little detail.  i did get a good enough look at its starboard side to see that it was definitely three-dimensional.  whatever it was, i would estimate that it was flying at about 200-300 miles per hour, at an altitude of less than 2000 feet.  i watched it for a good 4-5 seconds and then it disappeared into the night.  now, i have done 20 years in the military, and have observed numerous types of aircraft in a wide variety of applications, including day and night close air support under combat conditions.  i have been around military aircraft (and in them) long enough to have a pretty good idea what they look like, move like and sound like.  this fella is clear outside the scope of my experience.  i left me feeling kind of dumbfounded.  i didn't feel threatened or frightened, but my curiousity has definitely been at work.  what was this?  why was it flying so low and letting itself be seen.  who or what is crewing it?  and, most of all:  why is it here???
content.summary: Large, dark object with strange "lights" flies silently, directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I just started reading your web site,preety neet stuf,i will be watching your show.Thought i might as well join the band wagen and tell my story as crazy it mite be.I was in high school at the time in so. fla. my parents had just bought 20acres in so. marion co,it was,at the time,in the middle of no where (bfe).My parent asked me if i would like to ask my fishin/huntin buddy(will call him chet for now)if he would like to go to the property this weekend to do some hunting.Yea you bet he would,thats all we ever did when we were young,that and chase girls.At that time my parents had put a small travel trailer on the property.We had a verry cool chevy chevelle station wagon, it worked gerat for hunt,fish.That sat. nite it was pretty cool air ,about low 50.My parents stayed in the trailer and chet and i stayed in the wagon.We had our sleeping bags laid out inside with a 12ga. ,22and a 410ga shot gun in between us. the 22 had a small scope on it and chet brought his dads binoculers with him.About 3am we both woke up,in side the tree line(50yrds away)30yrds into the treeswe saw a orange glowing perfect ball hovering 1-3ft off the ground.It would grow up and down from the size of a basket ball to the size of a vw beetle.I told chet lets go out there,he looked at it with the binoculars and firmly said no!I said ,hay we got guns.Another firm no was his answer.He was afraid of something, i did not understand this from him.I was always the chicken [cms/pd] of the two of us!Seconds later his head hit the pillow as if he was shot.Thats all i remember,i to must have "passed out".Next day we took alook at the area where we saw this thing,no sign of fire,foot prints made by man or even wildlife.The trees had no leaves on them(time of year).To this day chet will not talk of the event,but before we both die i`ll beat it out of him as to what happen in those woods to scare him so bad!
content.summary: Orange sphere1ft dia,grew to vw beetle size and back to 1 ft,1-3ft. off ground

content.detailedDescription:
I have video of lots-lots!!! of black white black objects, i caught
in the background on tv july 26,2008. weather for the day.
these objects are in the background next to......
the video is from one of ...... yes i know they exist, what they do
know body knows yet.

i can show you the video in three speeds, to be able to see these
objects better.

i also have video of the same type of  black white black objects
in washington dc year 1952, yes 1952. you will see the object
come down from the the sky fly into a tree area, two objects appear.
second one lights up black white black above a tree. yes this proves
how long they have been with us.

you must see my video there are at least 10 or more at this location.
the thing about this is extremely interesting because they are flashing
all over the place, its 12:18 pm middle of the day.
content.summary: Black white black objects flashing

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading home after work. i take i-43 south for about 19 miles. i got on the interstate, set the cruise and started my long drive home. approximately 2-3 minutes into my drive i noticed what appeared to be a bright star in the western sky. i determined that is was a star so i took my eyes off of it and continued. i looked at it again and it appeared to be moving. i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me, so i looked again, and i noticed it was moving. it was moving towards my general direction. i also noticed that the sky was overcast, so it couldn't be a star. i was heading west, southwest on i-43 south. the light was headig east, southeast. as it got closer, i noticed that the bright light was a type of spotlight, beaming ahead of the object. it did not appear to be sweeping the light side to side, just ahead and down at about a 30-35 degree angle.
   the object was 3 spheres connected together, in an l shape. they appeared to be roughly 10-15 feet in diameter, accept for the end sphere. that one looked a tad smaller, about 8-10 feet in diameter. it could be the way the configuration was that made the last one appear smaller, but it appeared that way. it was moving very slow. it had no typical flashing lights like a helicopter or small plane. there were however lights on the object. very dull lights on the spheres, bright enough to give me a view of the shape. i almost ran off of the interstate looking at this, i didn't want to take my eyes off of it. as it passed me i saw it in my mirrors, and it had a slow pulsating red light, almost a glowing effect. i was able to keep it in view of my mirrors for a few minutes. i regret not getting out and really looking at this. i was , i guess, stunned, trying to explain it away, in denial? i then turned around and started to see if i could catch up to it, and could not find it again. shortly thereafter it started to rain and there were a few flashes of lightning in the southern sky. i then proceeded home.
content.summary: Multi-circular object flew over me while in my car with beam of light pointed ahead of it

content.detailedDescription: Ther i was sting in my trailor with my sweat megatron actshun figyur when i dun heard a noise outside. i picked up my bigpak of wild bary poptarts and went outside to see wut waz shakin. i looked upe into the ski and wha i saw doen scured me realy bad. i saw an aleinn in his chevron-lookimn disk and i yelld up to him "wat do u want!??" he did nawt answur me. i offord him a poptart. he sed no. i went insyde to git some corn popps. i went outsyde an he was vanisheed.
content.summary: I saw an aleinn he dont like wild bary

content.detailedDescription: It all started when i was at stanges park in merrill,wisconsin. i was sitting next to some bushes with one of my friends. then all of a sudden i saw some weird oval shaped object flying across the sky at what seemed to be a low rate of speed considering it had a really low humming sound coming from it, but it might of sounded like that because it was going so fast. all i know is that i'm pretty damn sure it wasn't a plane, because what i heard was probably louder then a train. it sounded as loud as being right in front of a train when the whistle blows when it comes by, but a really low humming noise. i thought it would have been bigger then  it looked cause it was so loud, but i guess not. i can also verify that there were red, white and blue lights flashing in an odd pattern that i saw the last time i sighted a ufo. i lost sight of the object when it got out of view behind the tree line.
content.summary: I saw an oval shaped object moving across the sky very slowly and it was making a very low humming sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside my house looking southward (toward detroit metro airport which is about 10 miles straight south from my house) and admiring all the airplane lights in the sky.  there were so many because it was so clear and i could see them practically to the horizon and many more stars were visible than usual.

i noticed a large round and very white ball crossing from east to west moving much faster than an airplane would.  it appeared to be a fireball. when i first saw it, i was confused because it was so big.  if the airplane lights were the size of the period at the end of the sentence, this object was the size of a dime held about seven feet from my eyes.  i was afraid it was a large meteor and it was going to crash into a populated area.

it moved in a straight line, it did not appear to lose altitude, the light seemed as if i was looking at more of a light bulb than a fireball, except there was a tail that made the overall shape appear to be a long oval.

i tried to remember everything because i knew i was going to report it to mufon.  i was first confused, then concerned, then just amazed.  the amazement came when the object simply disappeared with no change in altitude, no fading, no trailing pieces.  i watched for a few more minutes but nothing else happened.  it disappeared at what i would describe a 2 o'clock position, and i remember thinking that i did not want to lose sight of it behind a tree.  the leaves are off the tree.  the object disappeared as it approached the tree, which was my object of reference.
content.summary: Fireball crossed the sky, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I have kidney stones,so often at night,i just pee out by my tree. i always look at sky at night,if only to see how clear or cloudy it is. i see planets ( whith lights that don't shimmer ) all the time and lately the last few months two in sky at different points. so,one night i look up towards the top of the hill i live on and seen three bright red lights in same area in sort of triangular formation and thougth they were planets. not the first time. then i thought to myself , how can three planets be in same location,what are the odds of that? i don,t know why ,as a paranormal/ufo inthusiast , i did not think this was a ufo sighting , as i got an ominous feeling  ( not first time for that either ) right away. it did not appear to have any movement and was too distant to tell if there were stars in between lights.Thius was appx. 10 p.M. on oct. 20 , 2008. i have seen a few strange things in my time , and have feelings of being watched ,since i was a kid , but almost always in the town i live in , but no real evidence of visitation , although , i would not rule that out.  i can hardly believe that i did not record this event in some manner, as i just wanted to ignore my spooky  feelings and not be scared. i admit that i often get spooked at night while watching ufo activities on t.V. or on internet.I also don,t believe that it took me a week to realize this as i watched a ufo story ( the triangular lights of 2004 story ) on the history channel wed. the 29th of october , 2008.I do remember that i seen this at another time , can,t give exact date , but think it was in september,2008,only in the exactpolar opposit in the sky,over hill,towards greensburg. i would judge by the size and distance that this was a locally situated phenominom, as usally i can only see a smaller area of sky,through the mountain clouds in a circular area.But,it was an unusually clear night. is it possible for there to be three planets in same area? the lights were diffintly  red in color and planet-like in size and brightness.I have always believed in ufos being real,weather or not extra-terestrial or not ,but this night i just didn't want to believe because of the ominous feeling i got when i realized that how can three planets be in that close of formation and i ran inside and locked my doors and windows.Also from time-to-time , i get a sharp pain in my left elbow and can feel something under surface of skin , although i was told that there was nothing there by doctors and have lost time and awakened in slightly diferent areas of wherever i was at the time.But not days just a few minutes or hours. also, i live about 10 miles or so from site of kecksburg crash and have had others tell me they seen things that they couldn't explain. why is there not people camped out in whitle strieblers back yard to see if he is really being visited/abducted,? was he proven a fake? i'd like an update on that please. also,what's up with bob lazar? wheres he been?And what's new in the corsco case?
content.summary: 3 bright red lights - no shimmer - same area

content.detailedDescription:
This is the accounting that i posted on http://lucianarchy.Proboards21.Com/index.Cgi?Board=ufotexas&action=display&thread=4329&page=1


i was traveling last night from ranger to wards lake leon around 7:45 and seen the weirdest lights in the sky. i had never seen anything like it. i was on the cell phone with my brother who was approx. 20 miles north west of ranger and when i started hollering at him about the lights...He ask what direction and i told him toward the dam at lake leon...Then he could see them. he had never seen anything like it either. the lights were big...Maybe softball sized in my windshield at their most intense. they came and went...And it was almost like they started small and then ballooned to wards me...Getting bigger and more intense. the color was kinda amber or at time a white with a reddish aura and smaller colored lights blending in or kinda around the bigger light. i know i am not describing this well...But i just have never seen anything like it. my brother said it was almost like the marfa lights..But not quite....That this was bigger and more intense. i was glad he seen it...Because my husband thought i was nuts when i got home. i live on the other side of the lake.

about thirty minutes after i got home...We had three low flying planes circle around the lake and then fly over our home. this was kinda odd as they were circling and very very low....But they were definitely planes. my parents who live over close to chaney high way said when they first seen the planes there were four and they separated. three went to the lake and one went back from the direction it come...Desdamona area.

i went inside and posted that i had seen weird lights on the eastland spin. time was round 8:30. about 8:45, my brother called me and he had gotten home (he lives out close to the lake too). he told me to go out side and see if i could hear anything weird. once outside...First thing i noticed was all the dogs in the neighborhood were barking and the cows in the pasture behind my home were all bawling. my lab was worked up...Jumping off the porch and running around the yard and then back to me. his hair on his back was standing up...And he was shaking all over. this lasted about 10 minutes and then he calmed down and all the barking of the neighborhood dogs subsided. my brother said his dogs were howling and one kept chewing on her leg. 

i don't know if the animals acting odd was related at all...Just thought that was interesting. overall...Last night was one of the weirdest nights i have ever experienced.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was driving south on 2461 and the first time i seen any lightd was about a half a mile before i got to the 570 intersection. the lights were towards the south east., maybe like the direction of desdemona.

content.detailedDescription:
Large object moving east-south-east around 21.45 on october 27th 2008.

triangular shape. no noise. flying low and slow at about 1000 ft. the lights

at the three ends of the object were not lit up - only the light in the

middle, and that was very faint orange. object looked to have some sort of

toroidal-spheroid object in the middle where the orange light was emanating

from, but the light was indirect.

object moved across the sky slowly and occasionally would "wobble" or move

very fast to another point on the same plane sideways that it was on

originally and then continue to fly east-south-east. object appeared to

start to descend as the lights were dimming probably over charleston harbor.

this lasted about 1.30 - 2 minutes.
content.summary: Large silent triangle moved from horizon to horizon
